repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on the puṣpasūtra or Phullsūtra (as known in south). According to the information in the A Descriptive Catalogue Of Manuscripts In The Central Library Baroda (ms no: 9795) the author name is Gaṇeśa. This is an incomplete manuscript.

msItem.title: Phullapota
msItem.author: Gaṇeśa

filiation.p:
A Descriptive Catalogue Of Manuscripts In The Central Library Baroda Vol I Vedic Compiled Gajanan K Shrigondekar and K S Ramaswami Sastri Shiromani 1925 Baroda Central Library pp 153-154. (Available at archive org.)
New Catalogus Catalogorum vol. 12-P 164

msItem.incipit:
1v 1 ram . pthatarāpote vini[r]mm[i]te yena phūllasū(deleted 2 syllables) tra śatairamalaṃ namostu nIlagravāya namo rāmānujāya
1v 2 (na)mo devakumārāya namo govindayajvane nimajjatāmuhamāhṃburāśāvuttārahetoḥ kṛpayā gaṇeśaḥ . ādāya phullahyapavādasūtrāṇyā
1v 3 yyādibhāveṣu karoti potaṃ . athoharahasyayoḥ kratvarthamadhītānāṃ pañcacatvāriṃśatādhikasahasrasaṃkhyākāṇāmāmahīyavaraṇāntarādīnā
1v4 ṃ sāmnāmūhagāne yonivatsvarā stobhābhyāsavirāmāśca yonivaduttarayogīrtiḥ .
msItem.explicit:
213v 1 naḥ . bho śabdasya bhuśabdāt purvabhāvītvañca atra tṛtīyabhakti ucyate . ānikāyāṃ atra yūtī tṛtīye (1 illegible syllable.) yaṃ dhana aṅikāyamāpadyate
213v 2 (gap of 2 syllables due to damaged folio.) vā? īti svaryo?ti niyatamutkṛṣṭhe kośādini ākṛṣṭa ekarādasparośonirhi?naṃ bhavati prakṛtavikṛtiṣu draṣṭavyaṃ pramoccaṃ prathamoccatvānniya
213v 3 tamupāyaparatvāt . prathamaḥ . āyāṃpuṣārayiḥ ?

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 5 blank folio, 213 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin.

additions.desc: On 1v śubhamastu avighnmastu is written in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added for word separation. Round bracket is used to show inferred syllable or letter. Question mark is used to show doubtful reading.
